metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10379 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Pillow before 7.1.0, there are two Buffer Overflows in libImaging/TiffDecode.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10379` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.1
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-4ubuntu0.1').
pillow-python2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
